row-one.title: Trust your deal partner
row-one.paragrapgh: Solution for trading between strangers online or face to face easily protects deal of any size for little money

list.paragraph-one: Service uses escrow principle, which has been known in the world for over 150 years and is widely used to protect real estate transactions.
list.paragraph-two: WinWin has adjusted this principle to protect deals of any size online or face to face.
list.paragraph-three: To resolve disputes, WinWin has developed a unique dispute resolution tool, that protects both buyer and seller from abuse.

list.paragraph-one: As an independent third party witness of a deal, stores data in the event of a dispute.
list.paragraph-two: Helps to anticipate the main terms of the agreement (e.g. what will happen if the goods don't arrive on time).
list.paragraph-tree: Limits the risk of fraud by correctly identifying the buyer and the seller.

list.title-one: The Buyer or the Seller chooses WinWin to secure the transaction
list.title-two: The Buyer submits payment to WinWin
list.title-four: The Buyer approves the quality or initiates dispute with the Seller through unique WinWin dispute resolution tool
list.title-five: WinWin submits payment to the Seller

row-five.title: When it’s worth to use WinWin
row-five.paragraph: When buying or selling any used item - a car, an Internet domain, ordering goods or services (e.g., furniture order or house repairing)

list-item.one: Payment only upon receipt of the product or service
list-item.two: There is enough time to check the quality before final payment
list-item.tree: Before sending the goods, there is time to change your mind and refuse the goods simply and free of charge

list-item.one: Reliable and affordable payment that is easy for buyers to use
list-item.two: Pricing and terms are tailored to transactions of any size, both online and in physical locations
list-item.three: WinWin’s dispute resolution tool keeps buyers from abusing quality disputes
